name: supermodal
description: A universal modal to remove the pain of modal on mobile.

scripts.dist: npm run scss && npm run browserify && npm run html
scripts.watch:dist: npm run dist && onchange 'supermodal.js' 'demo/*.html' 'scss/*.scss' -- npm run dist
scripts.watch:style: npm run style & onchange 'supermodal.js' -- npm run style
scripts.serve: npm run dist && browser-sync start --server dist --files 'dist/*'
